advertisingForComputer.label: MOBILES versions on Google Play/Apix Calendar & Firefox Marketplace/FL-Calendar

safeModeOff.label: Enable local backup of the password.

basicUsing.label: To use only calendar...Click on cancel.

safeSubtitleOn.label: Safe-mode is off (password is locally saved)

unloadAlert.label: Some texts are NOT SAVED : DO NOT CONFIRM page output then CLOSE or ENTER modified posts.

saveTextConfirm.label:
Some modified posts are open and not saved !
To SAVE them click on 'Save post'.

logOutConfirm.label: To confirm log out without saving, click on 'Confirm'

changeYearConfirm.label: To confirm new year without saving, click on 'Confirm'

userMailPrompt.label: To receive news about updates or new creations, and only for this purpose, fill the field below, otherwise leave blank.

userMailSentOk.label: I received your mail. Enjoy FL-Calendar ;)

pwdLengthNotValid.label: Password's length must be 6 to 10 characters !

idLengthNotValid.label: Name's length must be 3 to 10 characters !

userMail.label: Sorry we couldn't receive your email. You can contact us on info@pixaline.net !

changeYear.label: server error : Impossible to change date !

connectionIsClose.label:
session is closed !
You have to log in again then click on ''settings'' button.

noValidConnection.label: Current session became not valid ! If the error persists after sign in again: Close/restart your browser.

fatalRead.label: Fatal read error ! Try to refresh page. If the error persists, send message to email of page bottom.

fatalWrite.label: Fatal write error ! Click on same date. Modify text and click Enter !

idAlreadyExist.label: Name already exists. Choose an other one !

idDontExist.label: This name doesn't exist on database !

noValidPwd.label: This password doesn't belong to this name !

unknownError.label:
Unknown error has occured ! Try to refresh. Otherwise close/restart the browser before recall application.
If the error persists, send message to email of page bottom.

monthMissing.label: Month parent of this day doesn't exists !
